thread.title: Solana's BONK Surpasses Shiba Inu and Dogecoin in Trading Volume
thread.title_full: Solana's BONK Surpasses Shiba Inu and Dogecoin in Trading Volume

author: @shanghaiist
title: Solana's BONK Surpasses Shiba Inu and Dogecoin in Trading Volume
text: - BONK, a memecoin on the Solana network, has experienced a significant price increase, with a 6700% surge since January, outperforming Solana (SOL) and Bitcoin (BTC). Despite this, it has faced corrections with a 14% drop in daily charts and over 40% in weekly charts. - After being listed on Coinbase, BONK’s trade volume crossed the $30 million mark, surpassing Dogecoin (DOGE) and Shiba Inu (SHIB) on the platform. However, its utility is questioned, and competitors like DOGE and SHIB continue to dominate the memecoin market. - CoinCodex predicts that BONK may consolidate around its current levels and could reach $0.00001487 by January 1, 2024. BONK’s price may also be influenced by Solana’s performance, as it saw a drop after hitting a yearly high but could potentially rise if SOL gains momentum or if a bull run occurs in 2024. “` In the cryptocurrency world, a new star has emerged in the form of BONK, a memecoin built on the Solana blockchain. After a period of dormancy throughout most of 2023, BONK has experienced an explosive increase in value recently. This surge is attributed to its inclusion on Coinbase, leading to trading volumes that have eclipsed those of well-known memecoins like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu, with transactions crossing the $30 million threshold on the platform. Recent Performance and Market Movements - BONK has shown a staggering 6700% price increase since January, outshining both its blockchain base, Solana, which rose nearly 1000%, and even Bitcoin, which saw a 160% rise. - Despite its significant ascent, BONK has undergone a sharp correction, dropping by more than 14% on the daily charts, over 40% weekly, and 12% over the last fortnight. - Still, BONK has maintained a 244.5% gain over the past month, showcasing its volatile yet robust performance. Market Predictions and Future Outlook - Market analysts are cautious about the future of BONK due to its limited utility and the dominance of other memecoins like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu in the sector. - CoinCodex forecasts a potential consolidation around the current price levels, projecting BONK could hit $0.00001487 by January 1, 2024. - The coin’s future movements could also be influenced by Solana’s performance, which has recently faltered but may boost BONK if it regains momentum. - There is also speculation that BONK could benefit from a potential cryptocurrency bull run in 2024. [CoinGecko](https://www.coingecko.com/en/coins/bonk)
